website_summaries.verdict: The majority of buyers praise its support and adjustability, but some found the chair uncomfortable.
pros: Good, solid chair with breathable mesh back
Pneumatic height adjustment with a 17-inch minimum that’s especially popular with shorter buyers
Also features tilt tension adjustment, reclining back and lift-up arms
cons: Very poor instructions and a few problems with hole alignments during assembly
Some feel the seat has insufficient padding

customer_reviews.title: Solid good chair! Definitely would recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble! Love the color! Helps me sit up straight. Good back support. Had it for few months so far! I'm a bigger size girl (not tall haha) and its very comfortable for me! Love that the arms go up...I use that feature the most! Def would buy again! :) Im adding this a year later 3-19-16.... Still love this chair! Use it daily. Not one sign of wear n tear. Still perfect! Would buy another in a second! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Perfect chair and support for a small framed person!
customer_reviews.text: I went for it an ordered this chair on line. It is perfect for a small person, and very comfortable for long hours at the computer. I am 5' 1" and the big deep chairs case me to get back spasms due to lack of support where a smaller person needs support.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Marmar

customer_reviews.title: It was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: It was very easy to assemble. The problem is you don't know that the chair does not recline until you assembled it completely. It slightly goes back about half an inch with the least amount of tension and that's not anywhere near reclining. Of course it would be a pain to disassemble box it up and return it. So ultimately I'm stuck with a chair. It would have been okay if they said that in the description and not misrepresent the product.
customer_reviews.author: Ces A

customer_reviews.title: Short person approved - but noisy
customer_reviews.text: We received the chair 4/25/20, it is now 6/11/20. So far it's holding up great. The support is very nice for my back. And this is little person approved - I am 4'11 and am able to use this chair with comfort. Also loved by the taller people in the house. No one in this house weighs more than 190 pounds. The only issue I have with it is a few weeks ago out of no where the chair has gotten super squeaky. I can't move, turn, stand, or do anything on the chair without it making lots of noise. If you're okay with the squeak it should be fine. I think it's a great chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: The seat and back recline as one - the illustration is 100% incorrect
customer_reviews.text: I paid $84.99 the chair was easy to assemble it took me about 45 min to unpack and assemble - I carefully read and followed directions. It came with the tool required for assembly and spare parts, however, the back does not recline independently as the illustrations show. The seat and back recline as one (1:1) ration and and even on the lowest tension it will not recline effortlessly. This is not as I expected and after using this chair for about 6 hours I think it is okay-ish for the price I paid. I purchased the RELAXOBAK Original Orthopedic Posture Corrector for 16.99 - silly piece of plastic has significantly increased my comfort.
customer_reviews.author: HIDDEN

customer_reviews.title: the chair is nice, it's soft and offers solid back support
customer_reviews.text: In just the several months I've owned this chair, the arm rests are already wearing down. Also, one of the arm rests is incredibly loose, which means I'll have to take the entire back off to get to the screw to tighten it. Other than that, the chair is nice, it's soft and offers solid back support. Overall I think it's a decent chair, I just don't think it'll last very long, but that is subjective.
customer_reviews.author: William Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Not worth your money!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly uncomfortable for sitting in for the day. It is not the one you want to buy if you will be using it daily for extended periods. (Like a normal work day). No real padding in the seat worth anything. Total waste of money. I would return it in a heartbeat if I still had the box. Very disappointed considering I had read all the views. It definitely is not what it was portrayed as.
customer_reviews.author: NHollie

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair, great value - wish it was wider
customer_reviews.text: Chair is great, it is not quite as wide as I would have liked, but it is decent quality materials and very easy to put together, all required pieces including needed tools were present. The fold-up arms are great since it is not the width I was expecting I find that I tend to just leave them up unless I am just sitting in the chair to relax rather than work at the computer. works well on thinner carpet/rugs the blue color is a little darker than pictured it appears almost as a neon blue (by my perception of the picture) came in and it was a deep rich royal blue (I like this better)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this chair to anyone who plans on spending more ...
customer_reviews.text: I would not recommend this chair to anyone who plans on spending more than half an hour in it. The padding/cushion is unsubstantial, with very little in the center. I'm a lightweight guy and it feels like I'm sitting directly on the cushion board, so I imagine it'd bottom out even more for heavier folk. The fabric is also a bit scratchy and a bit too textured, causing slight discomfort even when clothed. Again, if you do computer work, stay away and spend a little more to ensure your comfort. The price was very reasonable and now I know why. On the plus side, it was very easy to assemble and feels sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RZ

customer_reviews.title: Not Impressed
customer_reviews.text: After having this chair for a year, I'm over it and won't buy another one. At first it was great and comfy, but I am in college online and so I'm at my desk for hours most days. This chair in about 7-8 months needed the seat re-cushioned. Now, I'm at a year and it's no longer comfortable (partly due to crappy products for re-cushioning), I can feel the bolts in the seat when I have my leg up on the chair, which I do often. I love the fact that the arms retract and the price, but that's really the only two good things going for this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Kienzle

customer_reviews.title: What looks like a nice true blue turned out to be a ...
customer_reviews.text: When a seller says the color may be slightly different I now know it can be very different. What looks like a nice true blue turned out to be a dull dark blue. I am keeping it only because I need the chair now otherwise I would send it back and get another. Also I will read more closely since I didn't realize that its seat was also mesh. I can only hope it holds up as long as my past office chairs one of which I still have I bought from an office supply store.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Chair doesn't lift
customer_reviews.text: Going absolutely crazy with this chair! The hydraulic lift won't lift!! The company (RTA) replaced the 'mechanism' because that seemed to be where the issue is, but it still won't lift. Don't know if the gas lift is the next possibility or what. I have had the chair for nearly 2 weeks and still can't use it. Waiting to hear from the comany again. I have put many chairs together and it is pretty difficult to do this one incorrectly, but something is not right wit this one!!
customer_reviews.author: baseballmom

customer_reviews.title: Works well, fold up arms are a nice feature
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair for my daughter's room, which she uses to study at her desk. Chair took about 20 minutes to assemble, but wasn't difficult as directions were fairly understandable. The construction is fairly durable for a chair in this price range. Flip up arm feature is nice. The ability to adjust the chair to allow it to lean back is nice, would be better if the chair could lean back a bit farther. She has used the chair for about 3 weeks and likes it. At this early stage, it seems to be a pretty good value for the money. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Peppin

customer_reviews.title: The chair was very easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: After searching this site for so many different office chairs I finally settled on this one. The chair was very easy to assemble, works exactly as described and is very comfortable even when using it for long periods of time. The chair's back rest is contoured very nicely and the mesh material helps keep it very cool and breathable The arm rests really makes the difference providing support that helps ease my wifes' carpal tunnel. This was a very good purchase and I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for comfort, functionality, and value out of an office chair
customer_reviews.author: Seraphim Dmitrieff

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend, defective and doesn't Recline
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these chairs, for the money they do the job, BUT as other reviews have reported: one of the chairs does not recline at all. So the point is, this chair does in fact recline (or is supposed to) but some are just defective. Waiting to hear back from the manufacturer. Such as simple chair, scratching my head how QA at Techni Mobili is so poor.....
customer_reviews.author: J. Sweigart

customer_reviews.title: Great chair for the price!
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a standard desk chair that is very useful and fairly comfortable this should be considered. The arms that fold up are a great feature as it allows it to slide completely under any size desk or table. I'm sure you can find more comfortable chairs but if you want a simple chair that will support your needs as a desk chair, this should be the one!
customer_reviews.author: aaronwmu

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive-looking chair, and fairly comfortable. Everyone’s body shape and size is different, as are preferences, hence the differing opinions on comfort. I found the chair to be a good balance of relative comfort, looks, and price. It’s a cheap chair - we will see how it holds up. Fairly straightforward putting it together, though one imprtant screw would not go in all the way. The fabric on seat and arms is a bit rough, not ideal for sensitive skin. Flip-up arms is a big plus, as is good back support.
customer_reviews.author: S. Kanter

customer_reviews.title: Love the flip up arms, but wish it was more comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair because of the flip up arms. Such a great feature to make the chair go completely under the desk and out of the way! It looks nice and rolls well. It's not as comfortable as I had hoped, because the back support is a bit too high and the seat is pretty stiff. I don't think I could sit in this all day, but it's good for my home office that I don't use much.
customer_reviews.author: DesertMom

customer_reviews.title: Great for tiny and short individuals who need lumbar support lower than traditional office chairs
customer_reviews.text: I cannot tell you how wonderful this chair is. I have a large curve in my back due to cerebral palsy. I have been searching for a chair for 3 years with lumbar support that fit well with that curve, and I found it in this chair!!!! This is also a wonderful chair for shorter individuals, which is also very hard to find. I am 5'2 and it is perfect in size for me. Would not recommend for big and tall individuals.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Gilmore

customer_reviews.title: Decent Task Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a great task chair but if you had to sit in it all day it would become uncomfortable. Not a lot of cushion. I like the mesh back but I do not like the mesh armrest covers, as they tend to chafe my arms after a while. The flip up arms are nice. My desk has a keyboard mount under the desk but I am able to raise the arms and roll the chair under my desk to get it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: The Fixer

customer_reviews.title: Default in design
customer_reviews.text: - The curve in the back of the chair is right in the middle of your back which makes it painful when you lean back, and uncomfortable. It's a a big default in the design of this chair. - The seat cushion, though looks fluffy, is very light, when you sit on the chair makes it flat feels as if you're sitting on the wood. I read lotta reviews on this chair, I ignored and still bought it, and I found myself writing a bad review.. would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Good chair for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good chair for the money. Like the first one so much I bought another. The folding arms is what I needed in a tight place. Takes up less room when you can push the chair in so close to the desk.
customer_reviews.author: ND23

customer_reviews.title: Screws easily strip
customer_reviews.text: The screw holes don't line up. One screw stripped and it is stuck. Can't do anything
customer_reviews.author: SHPham

customer_reviews.title: Works for my tween/teen
customer_reviews.text: Great chair for my 12 year old son. He is a little too light weight to make the chair go down while seated, but that is an operater issue, not a product issue. :-) LOVE the flip up arms which allows him to push the chair further in the desk. A nice option in a small room where space is at a premium.
customer_reviews.author: J. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Bad instructions, really heavy, but moderately comfy
customer_reviews.text: Quite possibly the most poorly written instructions that I’ve seen come with a product. Things are labeled via numbers going across the page and unless you’re a visual learner and follow pictures it will be difficult to assemble. Next, this chair is HEAVY. Compared to the last 3 chairs I’ve had, this one is hefty. Warning that it may leave scratches in your floor (it warns about this in the instructions) because it is so heavy. Sitting in it is fine, it’s not ultra comfortable but your butt will be fine for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Danni Hu

customer_reviews.title: looked great
customer_reviews.text: Box was turn and the item had a rip in it. Had to send back
customer_reviews.author: Shurie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfortable! I can stay in it for like ...
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this chair but I really needed a new one that was mesh, rolled, and had flip arms. Since this was highly rated and in stock I went with this one! Pretty comfortable! I can stay in it for like 3 hours. The back isn't as slanted as much as I like so I'm sitting up really straight. Back does tilt though so that helps. Still a good chair and I'm happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable office chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair. No instructions & multiple screw sizes. Hard to determine proper placement so it was a process of elimination. Having arms that can be used or moved out of the way is a great feature.
customer_reviews.author: Stariis

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair was affordable, relatively easy to assemble and is comfortable. I love the adjustable armrests (sometimes I want to rest my arm, sometimes I don't).
customer_reviews.author: lmkludy

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE ,LOVE THIS CHAIR!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to assemble and the arm rests go ALL the way up like movie theatre arm rests. !! Great when typing, then bring them down when wanted. The chair is comfy and the wheels glide nicely, no hitches in movement. And the price is great as well. Highly recommend. I am 5.3 and165 lbs and fit in the chair with space on the sides.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Zimmerman

customer_reviews.title: Not for all day work use
customer_reviews.text: Currently working from home due to covid-19. This chair after only a few days using is not very comfortable. I might as well sit on my carpet that's how my butt feels. Cushion is not very sturdy and almost gone. Again just got it last week and its already used up. I have to say I work 8h-12h on my desk a day. Just ordered a more expensive and sturdier one and will return this one asap.
customer_reviews.author: Sara P.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The cushion is not cushy at all. Dont spend the money. Any chair you get try it out for at least a week. If you dont like it return it quick. We waited too long. I have bought so many chairs with this same situation.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Choi

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this chair. I would’ve went with a diff color if I would’ve known the blue would’ve been this dark but we made it work. The picture displayed makes it look like a lighter, prettier blue but it’s still a great chair. You can put the arms up or keep them down.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Dupree

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Just as nice as a similar chair we bought from Costco for twice as much. Those the Costco chair does have a higher weight limit. If you don't need a chair to hold 350lb this is fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Thompsolonian

customer_reviews.title: not much
customer_reviews.text: Seat is too short for longer upper legged people and it leans forward giving the affect of falling in the floor. on a good note..the padded seat itself is comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most reviewers, i did not have high expectations for a 100.00 office chair. It is not as stable as i would like and uncomfortable when used for long periods. I WISH AMAZON WOULD LIST COUNTRY OF ORIGIN/MANUFACTURE. Had I known this chair was made in China, I definitely would not have bought it.
customer_reviews.author: none

customer_reviews.title: Does not recline. Lift up arms is the only positive thing.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that the arms raise that is pretty much the only reason I have not gotten a different chair yet. The assembly is also really easy. The seat isn't super comfortable, there isn't much padding. My biggest complaint though is that it does not recline easily. I weigh 135 lbs and I have to push with my legs to get the chair to recline with the tension as loose as it will go. Wish I had not wasted my money on this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Charter

customer_reviews.title: Very nice chair
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. Just what I needed (the foldup arms) meaning I can push it up closer to the desk so it takes up less room. Nice.
customer_reviews.author: Eric C. Welch

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price
customer_reviews.text: After one year it is still in great shape and is rather comfortable for a budget friendly office chair that I spend up to 8-9 hours in on some days. Only downside for me is the inability to adjust the armrest height, but I do like that they can folded up and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: Great value and pleasant on the eyes
customer_reviews.text: Simple to assemble, supportive and comfortable and well priced. And the colors are really nice - I got red and blue chairs. These are a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Rehab and OccMed

customer_reviews.title: loving this chair!
customer_reviews.text: was really easy to assemble and i love that the arms raise up to tuck the chair in under the desk when not in use!! I ordered the blue one and the color is great!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A Comfortable task chair.
customer_reviews.text: A Comfortable task chair. Made well. Hope to get many years out of this one. Assembly did have its moments, that's why 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Paul J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy. Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This chair is a great buy. Purchased several for my work place. Hold up very well. Personnel like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie Judge

customer_reviews.title: Office Chair
customer_reviews.text: The chair is comfortable. I'm 6'4" @235lbs and it fits me just fine. The only reason that I didn't give it 5 starts is because the wheels are little hard to roll around our hardwood floors. Other than that everything is fine.
customer_reviews.author: BigHook

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Good size chair, not small. Very basic office chair, it’s comfortable but the cushion could be thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Drew H.

customer_reviews.title: my back
customer_reviews.text: My back feels much better now that I have this chair.
customer_reviews.author: J R

customer_reviews.title: This is so easy on my back
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy on my back, and the seat is shallow enough that I actually get a full back support! arm support is a good height too. I'm considering buying another one for my work.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: and I like that the arms fold up
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair because another reviewer said it was "Better than Eron." Nope. Not even close. Seat is padded, not webbed. It's not uncomfortable after you get used to it, and I like that the arms fold up.
customer_reviews.author: Däch

customer_reviews.title: Good chair, bad seat
customer_reviews.text: Great everywhere except the seat is pretty uncomfortable after sitting in it for a few hours.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy. The mesh is nice. Good support.
customer_reviews.text: My son needed a new desk chair. This was nice quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: R.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I am a shorter person at 5'2" and I can touch the floor and reach my table with back support. Most bottom cushions are too long for that to happen. I love that the arms move. I usually don't like having arms on my chair because I cannot get close to my desk/table but it's not much of an issue. I use one arm and keep the other up. Love the versatility
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Spies

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and expensive looking.
customer_reviews.text: Looks and feels expensive. I love that the arms pivot up so the chair can fit very close to the desk.
customer_reviews.author: M K

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and good qualty while the folding arm rest are very handy
customer_reviews.author: Arno Basson

customer_reviews.title: Decent Chair
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair. Very Comfortable. The only problem I have with it is the foam pieces of the lefts side arm cover isn't fully secure, and lifts off of the arm itself sometimes while I am adjusting in the chair. I assume it is an isolated issue and would buy the chair again.
customer_reviews.author: @FinDomSarah

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, I tend to slump at my chair but ...
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, I tend to slump at my chair but this chair makes me sit up straight and makes my posture better when working at my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seat cushion wont last enough
customer_reviews.text: Is comfortable, has good support and you will be able to sit 8 or more ours without any pain, the problem is that the cushion wont last enough, after 3 moths of daily use the cushion disappeared it's completely squashed
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Alberto Perez Avalos

customer_reviews.title: This is the chair to buy if you want to do online stringed instruments lessons
customer_reviews.text: Unlike many other chairs with folding arms that I looked into getting, this chair's arms ACTUALLY fold back TOTALLY out of the way which makes this chair ideal for anyone looking to learn ukulele, guitar, mandolin, banjo, or other stringed instruments using online tutorials.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent K Hudkins

customer_reviews.title: The seat is short. The material of the seat ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat is short. The material of the seat is also slippery with slacks or dresses. It's hard to stay on the chair without sliding a bit. It was okay for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful And Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is such a comfortable desk chair and beautiful too. The lifting arms are a great addition. Great value and construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair!
customer_reviews.text: Great chair! Quick delivery and assembly took less than 30 minutes. The chair is well made and it fits the small of my back nicely! It is the perfect height and fit and is very comfortable. I absolutely love that the arms flip up. It makes it much easier to keep the chair closer to the desk when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. I think one of the best functions is that the arms fold up all the way
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Best Chair
customer_reviews.text: this chair is very sturdy and comfortable and the price is good also
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: So I love the flip up arms
customer_reviews.text: So I love the flip up arms!!!! This chair is perfect me.....love the mesh back and the seat ain't too bad either. Of course I'm 5' 7" and of smaller stature so there's no problem w/weight requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: The air cylinder lasted about 5 months with occasional usage. It now sinks about 6 inches when sat upon.
customer_reviews.author: Linkisme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent chair for anyone especially musicians (Rollback arms
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chair for anyone especially musicians (Rollback arms.) Assembled ij minutes and sturdy as a rock . I am 215 lbs Great price.Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Nations

customer_reviews.title: Great space saver
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Love that the arms flip up, so great for saving space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it's been doing fine so far
customer_reviews.text: I'm 6'3 and 230 pounds. This chair was a cheap work replacement for me, and it's been doing fine so far. It's a chair, and it hasn't broken, so pretty good I guess.
customer_reviews.author: David Deloria

customer_reviews.title: Great chair - was having back issues with my previous ...
customer_reviews.text: Great chair - was having back issues with my previous chair this one has support right where I need it - constructed well - highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: C. D. Palmer

customer_reviews.title: The opposite of comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: After a little use the seat gives out. You can feel the bolts that you used to assemble the chair through the cushion. The opposite of comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: jpeasy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: The chair is good. But not great. If I had to do it all over again. I would spend the extra money for a better chair.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy B.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. My employees at work love them! Semi easy to put together
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Owens

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembly and very comfortable office chair
customer_reviews.text: Very easy assembly and very comfortable office chair. Easy to adjust to whatever height you would like and you could also adjust the arms. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: Looks good!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived great condition. Husband put it together quick & easy. Love how the arms go up to put completely under my desk.
customer_reviews.author: KayK

customer_reviews.title: Terrible design
customer_reviews.text: The seat on this chair leans forward, pitching you forward into an unacceptable position. An "adjustment" knob is nob-functional .
customer_reviews.author: jahonnie

customer_reviews.title: I like the back support that this chair provides
customer_reviews.text: I like the back support that this chair provides. Seating is not as cushy as I would prefer but it is still a comfortable chair for sitting long periods. I would definitely recommend this chair!
customer_reviews.author: Kandyd

customer_reviews.title: ... a little more padding but having adjustable arms is great.
customer_reviews.text: I wish the seat had a little more padding but having adjustable arms is great.
customer_reviews.author: Emma O

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great - feels great! Took about 30 min to put together. Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Squeaks all day
customer_reviews.text: It's an ok chair, but not very sturdy and I'm a small person. It squeaks all day and is very annoying!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joann S.

customer_reviews.title: bad for oyur back
customer_reviews.text: unimpressive, doesn't lean back vry far and that kills my back.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It is great with amazing support and you cannot find a better chair for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Elijah Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very good value for the price. It's nice the arms go up and down. Glad I didn't get the cheaper version.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I just bought it, waste of money. not comfortable to use. I've made a lot of adjustments and it is really uncomfortable!
customer_reviews.author: emgeebee

customer_reviews.title: comfy and easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: comfy and easy to set up. holds up well on wear and tear. constantly use this and it survives the cat trying to scratch it.
customer_reviews.author: Picky scientist

customer_reviews.title: Great chair!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, comfortable, and functions like a dream. Do not think I will need another office chair. But if i do, I will buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: PunkabillyBetty

customer_reviews.title: Great, comfy chair!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this chair!! I bought it to go with a desk I bought for my daughter. It was easy to assemble, and is very comfortable. I would highly recommend this office chair!!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Jo

customer_reviews.title: It feels a lot more comfortable than it looks
customer_reviews.text: It feels a lot more comfortable than it looks. The chair backing assists with sitting up straight and improves your posture greatly. It takes a bit to get used to, but it's worth it in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Christina M.

customer_reviews.title: Good office chair
customer_reviews.text: Nice chair -- I find it comfy -- I like that the arms swing away. The lumbar has helped my sciatica. I would recommended this to a medium size person.
customer_reviews.author: AmyJo Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; study and best feature is the pull up ...
customer_reviews.text: Looks great; study and best feature is the pull up arms so the chair can be pushed in under the desk.
customer_reviews.author: Mike in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this chair! The adjustable arms are an added feature.

customer_reviews.title: Best Desk Ever
customer_reviews.text: Super comfy. I spend a lot of time working at my desk, so thats really important. The flip up arms are a nice option to have.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again but dont need to with warranty!
customer_reviews.text: The blue is beautiful! Really easy to ensemble. Came with all the pieces. Reclines and adjusts height easily. Perfect purchase!

customer_reviews.text: Comfy for my home office. Easy to put together. Great value!

customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable chair, I'm enjoying my investment. I'm thinking of buying another one.

customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an excellent office chair without spending a fortune, this is it.

customer_reviews.title: The seat tilts forward and the fabric is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: The seat tilts forward and the fabric is a bit slippery the chair itself is comfy and sits solidly
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable chair with good back support. We bought one and decided to order two more.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Techni Mobili Task Chair
customer_reviews.text: Very good, comfortable chair for the price ($89). I really like the foldup arms, as they allow you to slip the chair into the desk when not in use and keep it out of the way. Assembly took about 20 minutes. Also, has excellent wheels, that roll without noise on a hardood floor. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Darryl

product_meta.title: Mesh Task Office Chair with Flip Up Arms. Color: Black
product_meta.description: Color:blackThe Techni Mobili Mesh Task Office Chair with Flip-Up Arms is a fun, lightweight office chair with flip-up arms. It features breathable mesh back support, adjustable tilt tension control, and pneumatic adjustable height. It sits on a durable nylon base with non-marking nylon casters. It is ready and easy to assemble . Includes a 2 Year Warranty. Weight Capacity: 220lbs
feature_bullets: Breathable mesh Back support and mesh fabric Seat
Large nylon base and non-marking nylon wheels lend to mobility, stability
Adjustable tilt Tension Control and pneumatic adjustable height
Breathable Mesh Back support with adjustable tilt tension control
Heavy-Duty Nylon Base with Non-Marking Durable Nylon Wheels
2 Year Limited Warranty, Ships in 1 Box
